title: Brain & Body Balance
description: Yoga, Meditation, Sound Healing, Self-exploration & Guided Outdoor Experiences
text:
Balancing Body and Mind aims to help people create more positivity and happiness in their life. By developing stronger neural pathways, we can move forward with new habits, patterns and ways of thinking. We've all experienced some level of trauma throughout our lives. Rather than focusing on the traumas of the past, Katie aims to help her clients shift the focus from the traumas of the past to the power of the brain and what we can do with it right now.
Through guided experiences in nature, sound healing, yoga and guided reflection, empowerment and goal setting, Katie wants to help you live your happiest, most authentic and rewarding life.
